duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development, execution, and oversight of all tech operations at Commonwealth Commercial.
Supervise tech operations, establish IT policies, controls, and systems supporting firm strategies.
Analyze department tech needs; optimize equipment and software usage, manage vendor relations.
Evolve Salesforce CRM, manage integrations, devise software training programs, and establish controls.
Procure cost-effective tech equipment, facilitate SharePoint migration, and enhance knowledge of platforms through industry practices.
Foster mentor relationships for IT growth, identify training areas, and coordinate with vendors for cost analysis and budget control.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s (BA/BS) degree is mandatory. Minimum of 5 years of IT experience.
